Package au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source

Class CatalogSource

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.AbstractSource
au.csiro.pathling.library.io.source.CatalogSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataSource, QueryableDataSource
public class CatalogSource extends AbstractSource
A class for making FHIR data in the Spark catalog available for query.
Author:
John Grimes, Piotr Szul

    • CatalogSource

      public CatalogSource(@Nonnull PathlingContext context, @Nonnull String schema)
      Constructs a CatalogSource with the specified PathlingContext and schema.
      Parameters:
      context - the PathlingContext to use
      schema - the schema to use for the catalog tables

    • CatalogSource

      public CatalogSource(@Nonnull PathlingContext context, @Nonnull Optional<String> schema, @Nonnull Optional<UnaryOperator<Dataset<Row>>> transformation, @Nonnull Optional<BiFunction<String,Dataset<Row>,Dataset<Row>>> universalOperator, @Nonnull Optional<Predicate<String>> filterResourcePredicate)
      Constructs a CatalogSource with full control over all optional parameters.
      Parameters:
      context - the PathlingContext to use
      schema - optional schema name for the catalog tables
      transformation - optional transformation to apply to each dataset
      universalOperator - optional operator to apply to each resource with its type
      filterResourcePredicate - optional predicate to filter resource types

    • filterByResourceType

      @NotNull public @NotNull QueryableDataSource filterByResourceType(@NotNull @NotNull Predicate<String> resourceTypePredicate)
      Description copied from interface: QueryableDataSource
      Filter the dataset by resource type to remove entire datasets. This does not filter IN the dataset, but the datasets as a whole. If filtering of specific columns across all datasets is desired, use 
      
 dataSource.map(dataset -> dataset.filter(...));
      Parameters:
      resourceTypePredicate - The predicate to keep datasets
      Returns:
      a new DataSource containing only the datasets where the associated resource type matched the predicate

    • cache

      public CatalogSource cache()
      Description copied from interface: QueryableDataSource
      Caches the datasets in this data source to improve performance for subsequent queries.
      Returns:
      a new DataSource with cached datasets
